title: Metallica: Freeze 'Em All
brief_description: On December 8, 2013, Metallica created history by playing a show for fans and research scientists at the Carlini Argentine Base in Antarctica.
description: On December 8, 2013, Metallica created history by playing a show for fans and research scientists at the Carlini Argentine Base in Antarctica.
